name: Sinharaja Pain Relief Herbal Oil
description: Sinharaja Pain relief herbal oil is made according to an ancient traditional recipe. It brings relief to arthritis, nerve and muscle aches, pain and numbness in limbs of diabetic patients and pregnant mothers,neck and lower back pain,bruises,swelling,sprain,tremor,joint pain,muscle cramp and all nerve pains.*Images for illustration purpose only, Product received may vary.
